# Human
```{r setup}
library(haemdata)

se <- get_pin("hsa_mrna_mds_GENCODEr40_qc.rds")

pca <- pca_se(se, col_by = "tissue")
```

```{r pca_plots}
pca$biplot
pca$pairs_plot
```
```{r pca_corr, fig.height=9, fig.width=8}
pca$correlation_plot
```
